interestingcomments.content: Shim kit for M mount? /!/ I have a 90mm Elmarit that is back-focusing, seems like this would be easy to fix with some shims between the mounting collar and the lens body.  I found shim kits for other mounts but nothing made for Leica.  Any idea where I could find such a thing, or if kits made for other mounts would also work with M mount?
